subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jussi Jokinen deflected a slap shot by Dennis Seidenberg past Martin Brodeur with to give the Carolina Hurricanes a 4-3 victory over the visiting Devils and even their best-of-seven Eastern Conference series at 2-2.
snippet: Jussi Jokinen deflected a slap shot by Dennis Seidenberg past Martin Brodeur with to give the Carolina Hurricanes a 4-3 victory over the visiting Devils and even their best-of-seven Eastern Conference series at 2-2.
